      • get

        public java.lang.Object get(Hue.Property property)
                     throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Description copied from class: Resource
        Gets a previously loaded property from this resource. This method will not return null if the property was invalid; but instead will throw an IllegalStateException. You should use Resource.has(Enum) to check if the property exists before invoking this method.
        Specified by:
        get in class Resource<Hue.Property>
        Parameters:
        property - the property to get
        Returns:
        the requested property
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the property is not part of this resource

      • load

        public void load(Hue.Property property,
        java.nio.ByteBuffer in)
          throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Description copied from class: Resource
        Loads a property into this resource. If the property was previously loaded it may be discarded even if this invocation fails. The property will be read from the provided buffer from it's current position with respect to it's limit, but this does not guarantee that the position will be the limit after this invocation.
        Specified by:
        load in class Resource<Hue.Property>
        Parameters:
        property - the property to load
        in - the buffer to read the property from
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

      • skip

        public void skip(Hue.Property property,
        java.nio.ByteBuffer in)
          throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Description copied from class: Resource
        Skips over this propery in the buffer. Afterward the position will be as if the property had been read from the buffer.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        property - the property to skip
        in - the buffer to use
